title: Have Your personal, easy-to-fill-in path to Your Goals

data: “A Harvard Business Study found that the 3% of graduates from their MBA who had their goals written down, ended up earning ten times as much as the other 97% put together, just ten years after graduation...”
content.author: - FORBES -

data: “Reaching the goal is not success; success is moving toward the goal and experiencing growth.”
quote.author: - BOB PROCTOR -

data: Why do you train, study, relate, work, collect, etc?
When do You allow Yourself to be happy?
The purpose of our lives is to be happy
content.author: - DALAI LAMA -

data: '1916 C. F. Haanel presented in his “The Master Key System” the theory, that to be happy all men need health (mental & physical), wealth, and love. You can focus on them and keep them in balance.'
Analyse Your actions to understand their meaning. Filter Your thoughts and actions
See Your life as a list of proud thoughts & actions

If You are proud of Your daily actions, then You have meaning in your day. Do at least 2 things every day that You are proud of, and You have a meaningful life. Proudlist keeps track of Your Proudness

title: Review Your progress, calibrate Your focus, and make new plans.

data: You are closer to Your goals by the number of these actions already.
Check you`re on track and set the next milestones.
